Member Function Documentation

void Ogre::OSXContext::_unregisterContext ( ) [protected, inherited]

Must be called from destructor of final descendant.

virtual GLContext* Ogre::OSXCGLContext::clone ( ) const [virtual]

Create a new context based on the same window/pbuffer as this context - mostly useful for additional threads.

Note:
The caller is responsible for deleting the returned context.

Implements Ogre::OSXContext.

virtual void Ogre::OSXCGLContext::endCurrent ( ) [virtual]

This is called before another context is made current.

By default, nothing is done here.

Implements Ogre::OSXContext.

CGLContextObj Ogre::OSXCGLContext::getContext ( )

Grab the CGLContext if it exists.
